Text:
a month ago or so, a rumor surfaced that this storyline is the basis for will beale's script for the justice league movie. i read it on bleedingcool, so it might be bullcrap. who knows? worth mentioning, though!

thanks blackcanary!
That's good to know.  Thanks STFmaryville!
I've been looking for the Perez JLA issues FOREVER!!! Do you have any more? Thanks for posting!!!!
There may be more coming from the Perez run, but probably not anytime soon.  This marks the introduction of the New Gods/Darkseid into the mainstream DC Universe outside their own books/Jimmy Olsen
Canadia99, I'm not sure which issues DobisP.R. will scan next, but I'll upload them.

Canadia99, you can find old (but readable) scans of the entire original JLofA series in this torrent:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/6615963/
If you need a list, Wikipedia says Perez worked on 184–86, 192–97, 200.
And you may want JLA/Avengers by Perez & Busiek:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7863108/
Hope this helps!
